REUTERS.UNKNOWN: RM A f0921 reute b f BC-/IRVING-TRUST-<V>-RAI 04-01 0046

TEXT.TITLE: IRVING TRUST <V> RAISES PRIME RATE
TEXT.BODY: Irving Trust Co said it is raising its prime rate to 7-3/4 pct from 7-1/2, effective immediately. It becomes the fourth U.S. bank to raise the rate, following Citibank, Chase Manhattan and Manufacturers Hanover Trust. Reuter
